success.p1: Your information has been successfully registered in our system. However, please note that your registration is pending confirmation.
success.p2: Once you receive the confirmation email, you can go ahead and close the current page.

error.p1: Something went wrong during the sign in process: <error></error>
error.p2: If the problem continues or if you have any questions, please contact our <customer_support_e_mail_link>customer support</customer_support_e_mail_link>.

messages.too_small: Please enter a password with at least 8 characters

sign_up_form.terms: By signing up, you agree to our <privacy_policy_link>Privacy Policy</privacy_policy_link> and <terms_of_service_link>Terms of Service</terms_of_service_link>.

magic_link.p1: The magic link has been sent to your e-mail address. Please check your inbox, including the spam folder. Link may expire after a certain period or be for one-time use only.
magic_link.p2: If you haven't received the link within a few minutes, please try again later or if the error persists then contact our <customer_support_e_mail_link>customer support</customer_support_e_mail_link>.

error.p1: Something went wrong during the sign in process: <error></error>
error.p2: Double-check your login credentials (e-mail and password) to ensure accuracy. Ensure that the caps lock is not turned on and that there are no typos in your information.
error.p3: If you forgotten your password, you can <reset_password_link>reset your password</reset_password_link>.
error.p4: If the problem continues please try again later or contact our <customer_support_e_mail_link>customer support</customer_support_e_mail_link>.

messages.too_small: Please enter a password with at least 8 characters

sign_in_form.not_have_account: You dont have an account yet?

reset_password_form.success: If you registered using the provided email address, you will receive an email allowing you to reset your password.

error.p1: Something went wrong during the reset password process: <error></error>
error.p2: If the problem continues please try again later or contact our <customer_support_e_mail_link>customer support</customer_support_e_mail_link>.

update_password_form.success: Your password has been changed. Go to <dashboard_link>Dashboard</dashboard_link>

error.p1: Something went wrong during the reset password process: <error></error>
error.p2: If the problem continues please try again later or contact our <customer_support_e_mail_link>customer support</customer_support_e_mail_link>.

messages.too_small: Please enter a password with at least 8 characters

auth_error_page.p2: If the problem continues please try again later or contact our <customer_support_e_mail_link>customer support</customer_support_e_mail_link>.

update_user_consent_form.description: If you want to receive the latest information about the product, please check this box.
update_user_consent_form.success: Your consent to product updates information has been changed.
update_user_consent_form.error: Something went wrong during changing user consent.

update_user_e_mail_form.description: Please enter the email address you want to use to log in.
update_user_e_mail_form.success: The process of changing your email address has been successfully completed. However, in order for the email address to be changed, you must click on the confirmation links both on the old email address ({old_e_mail}) and the new email address ({new_e_mail}).
update_user_e_mail_form.error: An error occurred during the password change process. Please try again later or if the error persists then contact our <customer_support_e_mail_link>customer support</customer_support_e_mail_link>.
update_user_e_mail_form.submit_button_tooltip: To save the form, please make changes first.

update_user_name_form.description: Please enter your full name, or a display name you are comfortable with.
update_user_name_form.success: Your display name has been changed.
update_user_name_form.error: An error occurred during the name change process. Please try again later or if the error persists then contact our <customer_support_e_mail_link>customer support</customer_support_e_mail_link>.
update_user_name_form.submit_button_tooltip: To save the form, please make changes first.

update_user_password_form.description: Make sure your password is at least 8 characters long and includes uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters.
update_user_password_form.error: An error occurred during the password change process. Please try again later or if the error persists then contact our <customer_support_e_mail_link>customer support</customer_support_e_mail_link>.

messages.too_small: Please enter a password with at least 8 characters

update_user_password_form.submit_button_tooltip: To save the form, please make changes first.

click_up.inserted_success_alert: Your credentials have been added. Now you can close this window.
click_up.inserted_error_alert: An error occurred while inserting credentials. Close this window and try again.

remove_credential_modal.title: Delete Credential?
remove_credential_modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This may break any workflows that use it.
remove_credential_modal.error: Something went wrong during delete credential.

remove_workflow_modal.title: Delete Workflow?
remove_workflow_modal.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?
remove_workflow_modal.error: Something went wrong during delete workflow.

error.p1: Something went wrong during adding workflow.
